Articles.Content:
Greetings,

Not sure if this has been asked before (and it may be a noob question): How do you transfer a Kerbal from the Lander-can to the Hitchhiker Storage Container without doing an EVA? My space-station has a Lander-can directly connected (on top of) a Hitchhiker Storage Container yet when I'm in IVA "mode" all I can do is look around the Lander Can and not move to another area despite the fact that everything is either on top of one another or connected with Hull Mounted Clamp-o-trons and Robomax Humbax Multi-Point Connectors...

Is this simply not possible right now? Are these Hull Mounted Clamp-o-trons/Multi-Point Connectors not actually hollow to allow your Kerbals to move through them but are only for docking parts/ships?

I love EVA's as much as everyone just was wondering about IVA.

Thanks!
Transfers of kerbals through docking ports hasn't been implemented yet so for the moment it is EVA or nothing.
The Crew Manifest mod allows internal transfers between modules.

IVA is not fully implemented yet, but I'm pretty sure "moving around inside" is planned for a future update. There's a nice IVA scene of the hitchiker module waiting to go in the next update, but that probably won't include moving about.

It is as simple as you can't. I hope that may be an option in .20, but only time can tell. P.S. There is a mod that can, and it's pretty popular on the spaceport. I don't know the name, but once your in the spaceport it should be only a few clicks away.
